name.value: FHIR Connectathon 22 - Terminology Services - Subsumes - SNOMED - Not OK - POST - Code - XML

description.value: CodeSystem $subsumes tests against known and unknown SNOMED codes where the expected outcome is a failure response with a returned OperationOutcome. All $subsumes operations are performed using the FHIR Operation Framework HTTP POST method with Parameters of system, codeA and codeB.

Subsumes test for an invalid (SNOMED) system and codes using HTTP POST with system, codeA and codeB parameters; 3738000 (viral hepatitis) subsumed-by 235856003 (disorder of the liver). Expected response is 4xx/5xx with an OperationOutcome payload containing at least one error issue.
CodeSystem $subsumes operation for invalid (SNOMED) system and valid codes.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 4xx/5xx.
Confirm that the returned format is XML.
Confirm that the returned resource type is OperationOutcome.
Confirm that the returned OperationOutcome resource type conforms the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned OperationOutcome resource contains at least one error or fatal issue.
